item.title: Supreme Court will hear Trump tariffs case on fast track
item.description: A federal appeals court recently ruled that many of President Donald Trump's wide-ranging tariffs in imports from most countries are illegal.

item.title: White House criticizes Israeli strike on Hamas in Qatar
item.description: "Unilaterally bombing inside Qatar ... does not advance Israel or America's goals," White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said at a press brief...

item.title: White House says jobs revision proves Biden economy a 'disaster,' BLS is 'broken,' Powell was 'too late'
item.description: The latest Labor Department report showed that the U.S. economy created fewer jobs than had been initially reported in the year ending March 2025.

item.title: Europe and the U.S. talk Russia sanctions as attacks ramp up
item.description: "It is clear that energy dependency on Russia will be targeted more vehemently," an EU official told CNBC.

item.title: Potential Trump tariff refund bill could top $1 trillion as Supreme Court fight looms
item.description: The Supreme Court has not indicated when it might rule on a request by the Trump administration to decide quickly on whether many new tariffs are lega...
